description: A lightweight fleece jacket that does just about everything except create a big impact on the environment, the Polartec® Microfleece FZ offers up go-anywhere warmth thanks to its 100% recycled fabric. The breathable Polartec® 100 fleece wicks moisture and provides soft, stretchy insulation whether it's under your rain shell in camp or over a sweatshirt on a chilly day around the office.
name: Mountain Hardwear Polartec Microfleece Full Zip - Mens
